info.description:
This API will return a collection of Service Recipes for Menu Items and the nutrition data for a specific Location, Service Date and Meal Period.

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/service`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Service Recipe

tags.name: Service Recipes
tags.description: An individual Service Recipe and its Ingredients for a Location, Service Date, Service Area and Meal Period

tags.name: Service Recipe Nutrition
tags.description: Nutritional information for a recipe in a particular service area

get.description:
Returns a Hierarchal collection of Service Recipes and Ingredients for a Service Menu. This interfaces requires either service_area_id or sub_location_id to be provided.

![This endpoint is in production](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusprod.png)

200.description: List all Menu Items for Location, Service Data and Meal Period.

count.description: Number of records returned in request

get.description:
Returns a collection of nutritional data for a service menu

![This endpoint is in production](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusprod.png)

200.description: List all nutritional information for a recipe

count.description: Number of records returned in request

serviceAreaIdParam.name: service_area_id
serviceAreaIdParam.description: Unique ID of Service Area for a Service Date.  Either service_area_id or sub_location_id are REQUIRED.

subLocationIdParam.name: sub_location_id
subLocationIdParam.description: Unique ID of Sub Location aka Station for a Service Date. Either service_area_id or sub_location_id are REQUIRED.

mealPeriodIdParam.name: meal_period_id
mealPeriodIdParam.description: Unique ID of Meal Period for a Location and Service Date.

locationIdParam.name: location_id
locationIdParam.description: Unique ID of Location (Service Area ID OR Location ID is required)

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP Header variable will route to the Integration environment.  Only applicable in QA Server.

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify security

service_area_id.description: Unique code for a Service Area, sourced by PRIMA and kept for backwards compatibility, will be DEPRECATED

master_system_id.description: ID of the master system for the recipe

service_date.description: Calendar date of service in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format

meal_period.description: Descriptive name of service meal period

sub_location_id.description: Unique code for a Sub Location, sourced by PRIMA or MDG

recipe_name.description: PRIMA Recipe name of Menu Items

serving_size_number.description: Number of the serving size for the recipe

serving_size_fraction_id.description: ID of the serving size fraction

serving_size_uom_id.description: ID of the unit of measure for the recipe

uom_system.description: What Unit of measurement system is being used

sub_assembly_id.description: PRIMA Recipe ID if Ingredient is a sub-assembly (Nullable)

ozw_per_tsp.description: Decimal factor used for conversion of Once Weight (Nullable)

marketing_name.description: name of the recipe used in marketing purposes

marketing_description.description: description of the recipe used in marketing purposes
marketing_description.example: Beef, rice and fresh vegetables simmered in a hearty herbed beef broth

allergen_statement_not_available.description: whether or not the allergen statement is available

contains_shellfish.description: indicator if the recipe contains shellfish

contains_peanut.description: indicator if the recipe contains peanuts

contains_tree_nuts.description: indicator if the recipe contains tree nuts

contains_milk.description: indicator if the recipe contains milk

contains_wheat.description: indicator if the recipe contains wheat

contains_soy.description: indicator if the recipe contains soy

contains_eggs.description: indicator if the recipe contains eggs

contains_fish.description: indicator if the recipe contains fish

contains_added_msg.description: indicator if the recipe contains added msg

contains_hfcs.description: indicator if the recipe contains HFCS

contains_mustard.description: indicator if the recipe contains mustard

contains_celery.description: indicator if the recipe contains celery

contains_sesame.description: indicator if the recipe contains sesame

contains_red_yellow_blue_dye.description: indicator if the recipe contains red, yellow, or blue dye

gluten_free_per_FDA.description: indicator if the recipe is gluten free per FDA definition

non_gmo_claim.description: indicator if the recipe claims to be non GMO

contains_gluten.description: indicator if the recipe contains gluten

vegan.description: indicator if the recipe is vegan

vegetarian.description: indicator if the recipe is vegetarian

kosher.description: indicator if the recipe is kosher

halal.description: indicator if the recipe is halal

calories_from_fat.description: calorie content from fat in kcal

pct_calories_from_fat.description: percent of calorie content from fat

pct_calories_from_saturated_fat.description: percent of calorie content from saturated fat

pct_calories_from_protein.description: percent of calorie content from protein

pct_calories_from_carbohydrates.description: percent of calorie content from carbohydrates
